channel.title: No one can login to my source
channel.description: ok well i run utorrent i done a compelte guide and everything.. my source runs, then when i run client and stuff no one can connect either can i. any ideas whats wrong?

item.title: No one can login to my source
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“bowzer, post:6, topic:331512”][code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{

The IP address in EGUI is what your players are connecting to, for yourself you would change it to localhost. If that’s no the problem, you have not port forwarded correctly.
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“masterleet.no-ip.biz”, “masterleet.no-ip.biz”, “masterleet.no-ip.biz”
});
}
}
[/code] that is only thing i have about my ip in it. and thats EGUI.java i cant find no ip thing in client.java or anything. you know code to try to find it?[/quote]

The “masterleet.no-ip.biz” is what your players use to connect to your server, for yourself, instead of that IP, you’d change it to “locahost”. In client.java search “43594”, if it finds that then that’s not the problem. The problem is you port forwarded incorrectly.

Read full topic

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“masterleet.no-ip.biz”, “masterleet.no-ip.biz”, “masterleet.no-ip.biz”
});
}
}
[/code] that is only thing i have about my ip in it. and thats EGUI.java i cant find no ip thing in client.java or anything. you know code to try to find it?
